Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the 2nd T20I by 73 runs
Pathum Nissanka scored 54 runs off 49 balls
Charith Asalanka took 2 wickets for 6 runs
Maheesh Theekshana took 2 wickets for 7 runs
Dunith Wellalage took 3 wickets for 9 runs
Wanindu Hasaranga took 2 wickets for 32 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Pathum Nissanka was awarded the Player of the Match for his 54 runs
Charith Asalanka was awarded the Player of the Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka elected to bat first
West Indies were bowled out for 89 runs in 16.1 overs
The match was played at the Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium
